name: "Cover Me!"
effect: React: After a character within one rank targets one of your non-fighters: Perform a melee strike targeting the acting character.
"Dragon Keep must stand, Ahdi, damn the cost." -Etor Chance

name: A Simple Plan
effect: Spend Order: Target an opposing character within two ranks. Until the end of the next turn, this rogue has the ability, "React: After the targeted character performs an action: Perform a melee strike targeting that character."
"Mind if we borrow it?" - Nitesh Imaran

name: Absorb Energy
effect: React: After an opposing character uses an action card: This wizard performs a Scribe check (DC 14). If successful, the next time this wizard casts a spell of level 3 or less, he does not need to spend.
"A valiant effort, milady elf. Allow me to teach thee a lesson thy master hath forgot." - Castus the Burning

name: Abyssal Larvae
effect:
Mercenary • Abyssal • Monster • Astral
React: Once per turn, after one of your Abyssals uses an attached action card: Ready Abyssal Larvae.
"Lies. All Lies." - Antaelus

name: Acolyte Dorra
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral • Seer
React: Once per turn, before a character rolls a die: The character rolls two dice. After the roll, you choose which die is kept.
"Rejoice! The Voice hath heard thy prayers, and favored you with our services!"

name: Acolyte Miroslav
effect:
Deverenian
Spend React: Before a target Deverenian suffers one or more wounds, inflict a wound on one of your Stormwraiths: Reduce the wounds the target is suffering by one.

name: Administer Poison
effect: React: After one of your other characters targets an opposing character within one rank of this rogue with an action or melee strike: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10 + this rogue's skill) or become spent. If this character is an Assassin, stun the target if he fails.

name: Alexa Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Defend +5
React: After an action targets an adjacent Stormwraith or non-fighter Deverenian: Succeed with a Defend check (DC 20) to cancel the action or strike.
"I am a paladin, as my mother was before. Seek thy treasons elsewhere."

name: Alloy Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
Cannot ready unless adjacent to a cleric. May not equip Items.
While Alloy Gargoyle is spent, it has +2 AC and adjacent Dwarves have +2 ATK. If Alloy Gargoyle is stunned, both bonuses are +4.

name: Altar of Flesh
effect:
Unique
Undead or Necromancer only.
React: After a target Undead in your army dies, spend Altar of Flesh: Shuffle the target into your deck, then look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an Undead character and place it into your hand.

name: Antaelus
effect:
Mercenary • Hero • Abyssal • Monster • Astral • Epic
Antaelus is the same class(es) as your Warlord.
Order: Once per game: Attach a level one or two non-classless action card from your hand to Antaelus. While attached, Antaelus may perform the action once per turn, as if from your hand.

name: Apprentice Jarl
effect:
Deverenian • Apprentice
React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian within one rank hits with a melee strike: The strike's target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or spend and move back one rank.
"A student seeketh truth in passing odd places."

name: Ar'tek's Rampage
effect: Spend Order: If this character is in rank one, perform a melee strike targeting one character in each rank of an opposing army. These strikes cannot inflict additional wounds, and this fighter may not react to these strikes.

name: Arrax
effect:
NoThRoG • Elite Krun Guard
React: Once per turn, after Arrax kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike that may only target a character who shares a class with the killed character.
"Without Krun, your men are in chaos, Ar'tek. Perhaps this is a test." - Mekk'iah

name: Assault on Mourn
effect:
Lycanthrope only.
React: After this character hits an opposing character with a melee strike: Attach Assault on Mourn to that character. While one or more copies of Assault on Mourn are attached to opposing characters your Lycanthropes have: "Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank".

name: Athril Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • Unique
You must have characters of each class to play Athril Gargoyle. Athril Gargoyle is a cleric, fighter, and rogue, and enters play as though he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn, spend two of your Dwarves: Ready Athril Gargoyle.

name: Awena
effect:
Mercenary • Seer • Unique
Spend Order: Choose a card from your hand. Target opponent guesses the card's type (Item, Action, Character). Revereal the card. If your opponent guessed wrong, search your deck for another copy of that card and put it into your hand. Otherwise, remove it from the game.

name: Balance
effect:
Dwarf • Rockhome
Order: Once per turn, stun a ready Dwarf in your army: Unstun a target Dwarf.
"Run. NOW. Don't ask why, and don't stop until you see the sun."

name: Banyon
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Monster • Unique
May not equip items. While in this rank, fighters gain +4 ATK, rogues gain +4 AC, other clerics gain +1 HP and Lycanthropes have an additional strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).

name: Barrett Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Barrett is both fighter and a rogue.
Barrett enters play as a level 4.
Order: Once per game: Until the end of the game, Barrett gains +5 ATK, +1 Hit Point, an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK), and his items are considered blank.
- Designers Diary

name: Bascia Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Bard • Charisma +6
Once per turn for each class, Bascia may use the Charisma feat on a roll from a character of that class. This does not count as the feat's normal once per turn use.
"Honor - 'tis a gift most unfit for Deverenia's foes."

name: Behind the Scenes
effect: Order: Target a character you control in an opposing formation: Move the character forward or backward one rank.
"I would trust the Duke of Myerdeth, but that I know him." - Albrecht

name: Bishop Ionna
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor
React: After a Stormwraith targets a melee strike or action, discard a card: The target loses -4 AC until the end of the turn and may not have wounds removed or reduced this turn.
"Emperor. Hierophant. All that doth matter is the Storm."

name: Blackruby Dagger
effect:
Shield
For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Dagger gives Defend +1 and Riposte +1.
"Pretty fancy for a parrying dagger." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Blackruby Helm
effect:
Helm
For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Helm gives Scribe +2 and +2 Skill.
"Ah, I thank thee, noble cousin. Milady Ygraine will no doubt find honorable use for it." - The Iron Duke

name: Blackruby Mail
effect:
Armor
For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Mail gives this cleric Medicine +1 and other characters in this rank +1 AC.
"Behold Kor's bounty! Take this, and share it with the nations of the Accord in their time of need." - Garn Hearthstone

name: Blackruby Sword
effect:
Weapon
For each item in this rank with "Blackruby" in the title, Blackruby Sword gives Powerattack +2 and +1 ATK.
"Thank you, noble dwarf. TO ARMS!" - Albrecht

name: Blacksand Catapult
effect:
NoThRoG • Siege
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: You may spend a wizard you control. Target character within two ranks must succeed a dexterity save (DC 13) or suffer a wound (two if you spent a Wizard).

name: Bloodspite
effect:
Steed • Dragon • Unique • +1 Hit Point
Order: Spend Bloodspite: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Bloodspite: Target spent character within one rank must perform three consecutive magic saves (DC 20). Each time the target fails, he suffers a wound.

name: Bones of the Earth
effect:
Gargoyle only.
You may have any number of Bones of the Earth's in your deck.
React: Before this character dies: Shuffle it into your deck.
Order: Gain +2 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Brack Ghast
effect:
Elf • Undead • Stealth +6
React: After initiative is rolled, each non-Undead non-Necromancer in this rank must succeed with a poison save (DC 16) or be spent.
"A potent servant best kept downwind." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Brel
effect:
NoThRoG • Druid
React: After a NoThRoG Siege character hits with a melee or ranged strike, kill Brel: The melee or ranged strike inflicts an additional wound.
"…of course, it'll take more than this to stop a dragon."

name: Brinespawn
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
At the end of each turn, Brinespawn gains 1 Hit Point permanently.
"Even the swamp-beasts frolic and play, though not in the shadow of dragons." - Kara Wardeth

name: Brother Dominy
effect:
Free Kingdoms
While one or more Brother Dominy's are in a rank with a fighter, all characters in this rank have +3 ATK and +3 AC.
"I save them from Deverenian wounds to send them into dragons' jaws."

name: Brutal Cut
effect: Spend Order: Spend one of your fighters within one rank: Target a spent character within one rank. The target permanently loses -5 ATK, -5 AC and -5 Skill.
"You'll never hit the high notes like that, Forlourne." - Trevor Cartwright

name: Cairbre Netheryn
effect:
Elf Warlord • Assassin
Order: Discard a card: Target a character within one rank who must perform a poison save (DC 14 +1 for each Undead in this rank). If the target fails wound or spend the target (your choice).
He steals bones from his kills, not for magic, but for trophies.

name: Caitlyn the Free
effect:
Mercenary Warlord
Order: Once per turn, discard any number of cards: Search your deck for a spell with level equal to the number of cards discarded. Caitlyn may immediately cast the spell.
"The Kabal nor the Guild mayeth proffer peace, Zartoch, e'en as the giantess maketh war 'gainst both."

name: Carm Sengri
effect:
Mercenary • Ranger
Carm ignores class requirements while equipping Familiars.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"I will Scour the Yscarite heretics from this land, and then loose my pets upon Mourn itself."

name: Carrion Fiend
effect:
Elf • Undead
React: Once per turn, before an opposing character within one rank (two ranks if Carrion Fiend is adjacent to rogue) dies: Gain +1 Skill, +1 ATK, and +1 AC permenantly. If Carrion Fiend is adjacent to a Necromancer, gain +1 HP permenantly.

name: Clantz
effect:
NoThRoG
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain +5 ATK for the strike, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. The opposing character's controller may discard a card to cancel this action.
"Hagen? I'll tell you! Just get me out of here, Krun."

name: Coal Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
While the player to your left has no cards in his hand, Coal Gargoyle has +1 ATK for each cleric in your army.
React: Once per turn, after an opponent passes: If you have not passed this turn, ready Coal Gargoyle.

name: Commanding Energies
effect: Spend Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's skill, 13 + this wizard's skill if he is adjacent to a cleric) or suffer one wound (two if this wizard is adjacent to a fighter).
"Come to me wizards. Show me what you can do." - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Crippling Strike
effect: React: After hitting a target character with a melee strike: Until the end of next turn, the target inflicts no wounds with melee strikes.
"Superior stance. Sure, I believe that one." - Hagen

name: Crunchy Peasants
effect:
Dragon and Monster only.
React: After killing an opposing character: Remove a wound from this character. Draw a card.
"Their progenitor nearly devoured the world, but I don't know that Its descendents have such high-minded hunger." - The Loremaster

name: Cunning Shot
effect:
Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If the strike hits, spend the target and move him forward one rank instead of wounding him.
The dragon's spines struck at the rear ranks, drawing the nothrogs closer to it...

name: Cutting Stone
effect: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets have an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).
"A prize indeed; send it as tribute to Baraxton!" - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Cyldragen
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Dragon • Druid • Lycanthrope • Unique
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target all characters in a rank within two ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or be stunned.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Dallen's Eye
effect:
Dallen's Eye may remain spent. +2 Skill.
Order: Spend Dallen's Eye: Target another fighter in play, who has +3 ATK while Dallen's Eye is spent.
"Carry this with thee, my champion, and let no defiler know thy true calling." - Dallen Stormlost

name: De Mors
effect:
Elf
Order: Kill an Undead in this rank: Target an opposing character within one rank who must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or have his ATK changed to -2 (only 1 strike) until end of turn.

name: Demented
effect:
Dwarf
React: After Demented suffers a wound: Target a character within one rank (two if you control a rogue) who must succeed with a will save (DC 13, DC 18 if you control a wizard) or become spent (stunned, if you control a cleric).

name: Dragon's Breath
effect:
Dragon only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Target a number of characters within two ranks up to this Dragon's level. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 7 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound.
"Well, at least things can't get any worse." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Dragon's Fury
effect: Spend Order: Move backwards up to three ranks.
"Two men have done this - Altus Darkheart, through his theft, and the false Emperor, through his vanity." - Morrigan de Danaan

name: Dragon's Lair
effect:
Mercenary • Siege • Dragon
May not perform actions other than the following:
React: Before putting a Dragon into play, discard Dragon's Lair: The entering rank of the Dragon is reduced by one.
"Come, Garn. I think this explains much." - Etor Chance

name: Dragonhide
effect:
Shield
This character has a +4 Skill bonus for checks and saves.
"I found it in the Arcane's tower. Another gift for Krun." -Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Efrit Fire
effect:
Trap
React: Before this rogue dies from an opposing character's melee strike or action: The opposing character must make a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound. You may spend a wizard in your army to return Efrit Fire to your hand.

name: Elemental Madness
effect: Spend Order: All opposing spent characters must succeed with a magic save (DC 13, DC 18 if opposite alignment to caster) or becomed stunned. Each who was already stunned suffers a wound and remains stunned during the next ready phase.

name: Elissa Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Order: Once per turn, until Elissa uses this ability again, Elissa is a fighter and gains +4 ATK and Riposte +5, or Elissa is a cleric and gains +4 AC, +4 Skill and Medicine +5.
"Father is gone to war, and Varson gone from his sight. Who leads us now?"

name: Elwyn Rowan
effect:
Elf
After Elwyn enters play, choose a class, Elwyn becomes that class permenantly.
Order: Spend two characters with different classes in this rank: All opposing characters have -2 skill and -2 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Etor Chance
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Dragon Keep
Your Gargoyles have Defend +7 and the ability, "React: Once per turn, after this Gargoyle is targeted by a melee or ranged strike: Succeed with a perception check (DC 16) to ready."
"Show me where you found this."

name: Face Me!
effect: React: After a non-fighter in this rank is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, redirect the strike to this fighter. If the strike hits, reduce the wounds by one.
"Your fight is with me!" - Achilleus

name: Farglass
effect:
Marksmanship +3
React: Before making a ranged strike roll, discard Farglass: Either add +5 to the roll or inflict an additional wound if this rogue hits with the ranged strike.
"An enchanting trinket, O Saladin. What dost thou want in return?" - Lord Kestrel

name: Fel Rowan
effect:
Elf
Fel copies all classes and non-Warlord bold traits of characters adjacent to him.
"A little dwarf blood spilled, and suddenly I'm in a royal house. Isn't death grand?"

name: Fetter
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
May remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If Fetter is in the first rank, target a stunned character. Until Fetter readies or leaves play, the target does not unstun during the ready phase.

name: Final Faith
effect: Order: Until the end of next turn, opposing characters have -5 AC while stunned. If you have any copies of Final Power in your discard pile, target a character of equal or lower level who does not unstun during the next ready phase.

name: Final Power
effect:
Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If you have any copies of Final Rage in your discard pile, perform another +5 ranged strike.
...but the dragons united them before death.

name: Final Rage
effect:
Order: This fighter's next melee strike has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If you have any copies of Final Trickery in your discard pile, perform a melee strike.
They were enemies in life...

name: Final Trickery
effect: Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a poison save (DC = this rogue's AC) or become stunned. If you have any copies of Final Faith in your discard pile, inflict a wound on a stunned character within one rank.

name: Flamefang
effect:
Dwarf • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items. After Flamefang enters play, search your deck for an item and place it in your hand.
React: Before one of your Dwarves suffers wounds: Flamefang suffers the wounds instead. Move forward of backward one rank.

name: Flash Freeze
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn this wizard has the ability, "React: After an opposing character attacks: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 6 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound."

name: Focus
effect:
Dwarf • Exile
React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf readies during the Orders phase: That Dwarf attacks, spending as normal.
"Garn has shown me the way. Well, this way."

name: Fool's Fortune
effect:
Fool's Fortune may remain spent.
+2 Skill.
Order: Spend Fool's Fortune: Target another cleric in play, who has +1 HP while Fool's Fortune is spent.
"An amulet consecrated to Fineltour. It has caused more wars than all Deverenia's ambitions. A gift to you, my dearest." - Bronwen Tansiq

name: Fools' Gold
effect: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets each have the ability, "React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike targets an adjacent character: Redirect the strike to this character."

name: Forgotten
effect:
Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character card must succeed with a magic save (DC20) or return to it's owner's hand.
Order Discard a non-item card attached to a character.

name: Ghed Imogene
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
React: Once per turn, after Ghed Imogene is targeted with an action or melee strike: Perform a magic check (DC 20). If successful, cancel the action or strike. Reduce the DC of the check by 3 for each non-wizard in this rank.

name: Ghed Jaroslav
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Stormwraith • Astral
React: After an action in which one of your Stormwraiths is wounded: One of your Devereniands performs an Order.
"The Hierophant hath changed the sacred texts!"

name: Ghed Solan
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians within one rank is targeted by an action: The acting character may cancel the action. If he does not, he must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Goldenpeak
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Paladin • Unique
May not equip items. Goldenpeak is both a cleric and fighter. Goldenpeak enters play as if he were level 7.
Order: Once per turn, all characters in this rank gain +3 ATK, +3AC and +3 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Goza
effect:
NoThRoG
React: Before performing a ranged strike, kill an adjacent Siege character: Add +5 to the strike, and the strike inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

name: Healing Affinity
effect: React: Before a character performs an action to remove or reduce wounds, succeed with a Medicine check (DC 13) to increase or decrease the wounds reduced or removed by 1.
"Death. Life. Nothing is forever." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Heart of the Earth
effect:
4 Charges
Gargoyle only. This Gargoyle has +1 AC for each charge token on Heart of the Earth. After each melee strike targeting this character, remove a charge token from Heart of the Earth.
React: Before this character dies: Equip Heart of the Earth to another Gargoyle.

name: Icefall
effect:
NoThRoG • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If Icefall hits, inflict 3 additional wounds.
Order: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Ironfang
effect:
Steed • Dragon • Unique • +1 Hit Point
Order: Spend Ironfang: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Ironfang: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Ironrule
effect:
Steed • Dragon • Unique • +1 Hit Point
Order: Spend Ironrule: Move forward of backward one rank.
Order: Spend Ironrule: Perform a +7 ranged strike. Then, perform another +7 ranged strike targeting a character an additional rank away.

name: Jal Forsyth
effect:
Free Kingdoms
While in a rank with a rogue, Jal has an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).
"I've lost much, but I don't fight for revenge. I fight so my son can rebuilt what I've lost."

name: Jaqueline's Amulet
effect:
Jaqueline's Amulet may remain spent.
+2 Skill.
Order: Spend Jaqueline's Amulet: Target another rogue in play, who has +3 AC while Jaqueline's Amulet is spent.
"If Duncan didn't give it to her, who did?" - Jack Casey

name: Jet Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • Assassin • Stealth +5
React: Before an opposing character casts a spell or performs a ranged strike, spend a cleric in your army: Put Jet Gargoyle into play adjacent to the acting character. If you don't control a wizard, Jet Gargoyle enters play spent.
"What atrocity is this?" - Sjonegaard

name: Jin Valford
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Ranger • Lycanthrope • Unique
Spend Order: Play Cyldragen from your hand, spent, into rank four. He gains Jin's wounds and is now your Warlord. Remove Jin from the game.
Order: Once per turn, move another Lycanthrope forward one rank.

name: Kallistone
effect: Order: Spend Kallistone: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait. Until the end of the turn, the targets have -3 ATK, -3 AC and -3 Skill.
"To see it is to want it, to hold it is to dread its loss. A potent weapon against an enemy as greedy as a dragon, wouldn't you say, Etor?" - Garn Hearthstone

name: Kiras Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Spend Order: Target an adjacent Free Kingdoms character and remove Kiras from the game: Until the end of the game, the target has an additional melee strike while attacking (base +0 ATK).

name: Kor's Patience
effect: Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. If the strike hits, stun the target instead of wounding him.
"Just because it's ugly and mean, don't make it our enemy." - Labor

name: Kylia Smythe
effect:
Free Kingdoms
While in a rank with a cleric, Kylia has the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike, moving the target forward one rank instead of wounding him. Perform a melee strike."
"Fineltour provides, Keziah."

name: Kyros Calix
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
Spend React: Before a target Level 3 or lower Undead within one rank dies, kill Kyros: Remove all wounds from the target, who does not die. The target gains the Ethereal trait and loses -5 AC permenantly.

name: Lars Trunk
effect:
NoThRoG • Unique • Mountain Giant
Spend Order: Perform a +15 ranged strike that may target a character up to 3 ranks away. Any opposing player may discard a card before targeting to reduce the range to 2 ranks.
"That's right, Lars. Show the scary dragons where we are. Idiot." - Ar'tek

name: Lightning Charge
effect: Spend Order: Spend one of your wizards: Perform a melee strike (base + 0 ATK) against each opposing character in an adjacent rank. Perform a number of consecutive +3 ranged strikes equal to the number of characters killed by the melee strikes.
"New orders, Sceth. We'll finish here, but you're going to Baraxton." - Sar'ean

name: Lightning Strikes
effect:
Spend React: After an opponent passes: Ready an unstunned character of equal of lower level.
React: Before a character rolls a save from an action: If the roll is a failure and the action inflicts wounds on the character, the action inflicts one more wound.

name: Lodestone Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
For each Dwarf wizard within one rank, Lodestone Gargoyle has +1 Level for euipping items.
React: After Lodestone Gargoyle unstuns: Ready Lodestone Gargoyle.
"Yes, my king, your weapon is.. Now where did I put it?" - Supply

name: Lost Cause
effect: React: After a melee strike targets a character in this rank: Direct the strike to a random target in this rank. After the strike resolves, this rogue performs a melee strike targeting the attacking character.
"Better you than me." - Robin Jirar

name: Lost Pack
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope • Direwolf
React: Once per game after killing an opposing character: All Direwolves in play permanently gain +2 ATK and +1 AC.
React: Before Lost Pack dies: All Direwolves in play permanently gain +1 ATK and +2 AC.

name: Mad Yscarite
effect:
Mercenary
May not equip items. May not gain charge tokens from other cards. While there are 3 charge tokens on Mad Yscarite he has +10 ATK, +10 AC and +10 Skill, +3HP +5 Levels and the Dragon trait.
Order: Once per turn, put a charge token on Mad Yscarite.

name: Makusog Cavalry
effect:
NoThRoG • Siege
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks and the characters adjacent to him. Perform a +1 ranged strike against each target. Add +3 to any strike roll targeting a character that shares a class with another target.

name: Markappal Hag
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid
Spend Order: Spend a wizard in your army: Ready a spent Lycanthrope.
"Let the elder fight Angu. It's Crucin that should worry you."

name: Markappal Mire
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Order: Once per turn, permanently copy the printed ATK, AC, Skill and class of a target character within two ranks. If you control the target, his level must be equal or lower.
"Not as noteworthy as a host of dragons, but deadly all the same." - Kara Wadreth

name: Metamorphosis
effect:
Monster only.
Order: Kill this character: Put a Monster up to two levels higher from your hand into play in this character's position before fixing any illegal ranks.
"Our enemies will not change, not unless we make them." - Jin Valford

name: Mimicry
effect: React: Before playing an action card, target and spend one of your characters: This rogue performs the action as if he had the target's class.
"I hear it takes you wizards years to do this. What a colossal waste of time." - Cairbre Netheryn

name: Minor Dragonkin
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Monster
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Target an item within one rank. Succeed with a magic check (DC 8 + the item's level) to destroy the item.
"As Deverenus' blood to us, so the dragons to this." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Mistress Edrea
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Stormwraith • Astral • Riding +8
non-fighter Deverenians in this rank have +2 AC and +2 Skill.
"As thou asketh, dearest Ygraine, so must thou offer sacrifice."

name: Morrigan's Coils
effect:
Familiar
+6 Skill
React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: The acting character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.
"Come closer, and feel the Ten's wrath." - Morrigan de Danaan

name: No Escape
effect: Spend Order: Until end of turn, after any opposing character inflicts wounds on one of your characters, the opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or he does not ready or unstun during the next ready phase.

name: Opal Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
After the draw phase, return Opal Gargoyle to your hand from play.
React: After an opponent passes, play Opal Gargoyle from your hand: If you have a cleric in play, ready a Dwarf fighter with one printed strike.

name: Open Contract
effect:
After Open Contract enters play, name a class.
Spend Order: Target a character of the named class within 3 ranks: Perform a melee strike against the target. If the strike hits, stun the target instead of wounding him.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
effect:
Cursed • Epic
-4 Skill. Your Dragons are not Unique and enter play one rank lower. Your hand size is reduced by one.
Spend Order: Spend or ready a target Dragon.
"I found it! It's mine!" - Altus Darkheart

name: Osis Tansiq
effect:
Elf
Osis is both a wizard and a cleric.
"Well, Flesh smiles upon me today. What do I owe you for such a fine specimen, Fundisi?"

name: Pardon
effect:
Stormwraith only.
React: After a melee strike or action targets this Stormwraith, kill another character in this rank: Cancel the strike or action.
"The storm knoweth its true faithful, fleshless or mortal." - Ghed Jaroslav

name: Phantom Steed
effect: Spend Order: Move a character within one rank forward or backward up to two ranks.
"We can continue the trials, or we can end the NoThRoG incursion. Your choice, Caitlyn." - Zartoch

name: Piercing Strike
effect:
Monster only.
React: After this Monster targets a melee strike: Armor equipped to the target is considered blank for the duration of the strike. The target may not perform reacts during this melee strike.

name: Pious
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, opposing characters suffer a penalty of -1 ATK and -1 AC for each other character in that rank with the same class.
"You are right, Zeal. We must stop the king."

name: Poisoned Talons
effect:
Dragon and Monster only. May be equipped to characters who may not equip items.
React: After hitting with a melee strike: The target of the strike must succeed with a poison save (DC 11) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Poultice Sack
effect:
Medicine +1
Order: Discard Poultice Sack: Remove a wound from a character within one rank.
"No, Alaric. Don't die. Don't you dare. We have work for you still, Zeal and I." - Pious

name: Power Shot
effect: Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. If the strike hits, move the target back one rank instead of wounding him.
"Forget the lackeys. We just want the magic." - Synnove Ashenstorm

name: Prototype
effect:
NoThRoG • Siege
May not equip items. Prototype inflicts an additional wound when it hits with a melee strike. While adjacent to a fighter, Prototype gains the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Prototype's current ATK."

name: Raid the Armory
effect: React: After an item is equipped to any character: Equip any number of items to your characters.
"Grab everything you can, men. We'll need it all. A hundred crowns for each eyetooth of a dragon!" - Laird Jon Hawthorne

name: Rain of Fire
effect:
Siege only.
Order: Target an opposing character. Until the end of the turn, while targetting that character, Siege characters have a +4 bonus to melee and ranged strikes and ignore AC bonuses from items.

name: Reckless
effect:
Dwarf
While Reckless is spent, he has +1 AC for each Dwarf rogue in your army.
Spend React: After an opposing player passes: Move forward one rank, if possible, and perform a melee strike.
"Patience? How long'll that take?"

name: Reginald Tzin
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Target one of your non-Warlord characters within 2 ranks and replace him with a Lycanthrope of equal or lower level from your hand, putting the target on top or bottom of your deck. The Lycanthrope keeps wounds, attached cards, and the orientation of the target.

name: Regret's Shadow
effect: Mercenary • Abyssal • Monster • Astral • Assassin • Stealth +5
"Get away from me! GET AWAY FROM ME!" - Madness

name: Resonate Stone
effect: Spend Order: Name a non-faction trait, and target all characters in play with that trait: Until the end of the turn, the targets have the ability, "Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to this character's level."
"This is my forest. Not Rellion's. Not Signon's. Not the dragon's. Mine." - High Queen Tpheroth

name: Rotwing
effect:
Elf • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items. Rotwing may ignore the spend cost of one spell per turn.
Order: Once per turn, move forward of backward one rank.
"It lairs in Dythanus' city, pining for a bride long since left it." Phon

name: Rretrok
effect:
NoThRoG
While adjacent to one or more NoThRoG Siege characters, Rretrok and adjacent Siege character(s) have +4 ATK and add +2 to ranged strike rolls.
"Course I realize Hate's dead. You still need someone to grease the gears, don't you?"

name: Sacrificial Bond
effect: Order: Target a character in your army: Until the end of the turn, while this cleric is in play, any melee strike or ranged strike targeting that character targets this cleric instead.
"Damn thee, Chyre, if thou seest not innocence, I shall show it to thee." - Jaroslav Genecourt

name: Severed of Bone
effect:
Elf • Undead
Saves caused by Severed of Bone's actions have +1 DC for each Necromancer you control.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card: Target a character up to 3 ranks away who must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or be stunned.

name: Severed of Spirit
effect:
Elf • Undead • Ethereal • Unique
Spend Order: Name a class. Until the end of the turn, each of your characters in play of the named class has ATK equal to their printed Skill (for each strike). Modifiers to their ATK instead affect Skill, and vice versa.

name: Shadow of Greed
effect:
Familiar • Unique
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After an opposing player plays an action card of the named class during the Order phase, discard a card: Draw a card.
"The heretics want keenly for something beyond them, and this is how they will fall." - Carm Sengri

name: Shadow of Jealousy
effect:
Familiar • Unique
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After this rogue is targeted by a melee or ranged strike by a character of the named class: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character.
"They change their faces to hide their secrets, even from each other." - Carm Sengri

name: Shadow of Murder
effect:
Familiar • Unique
After you equip this item, name a class.
React: After another player puts a character of the named class into play: Perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK).
"A fate they've earned a hundred time over." - Carm Sengri

name: Shadow of Sloth
effect:
Familiar • Unique
After you equip Shadow of Sloth, name a class. While Shadow of Sloth is in play, characters must succeed with a will save (DC 14 + number of characters of the named class in the same army) to unstun.
"To devour the sick and the old." - Carm Sengri

name: Shared Fates
effect: Spend Order: Spend one of your rogues: Target two characters within 3 ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + cleric's skill) or be spent. If both targets fail the check they are both stunned instead and may not unstun during the next ready phase.
"Remember, Anandale." - Lekar Osud

name: Shiri the Stormkissed
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist • Unique
Skyborne Path
For each Stormwraith in this rank, Shiri gains +1 level for casting spells and +2 skill.
"Verily, Ygraine, all things art possible with the Storm's graces."

name: Sir Kolya Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Emerald Knight
Sir Kolya has +3 ATK while there are any wizards in this rank, +2 Levels while there are any rogues in this rank and +5 AC while there are any clerics in this rank.

name: Smoke Imp
effect:
Familiar • Abyssal • +3 Skill.
Smoke Imp can cast wizard spells as if he were a level 3 wizard with the Summoner trait, +0 ATK, 10 AC, +6 Skill, and 1 HP.
"Now, Xaros, 'tis perfectly safe." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Solus d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
React: Before attacking, spend an adjacent Stormwraith: Do not spend for this attack.
"Dark times indeed, an the Church war upon the Empire, the Storm-heirs upon the Stormborn."

name: Soul of the Dragon
effect: Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a fear save (DC 18, 23 if the caster is a Dragon) or move back one rank. Dragons may cast this spell regardless of class.
"Alas, Dythanus; you set your gaze too low." - Syneri

name: Soulwing
effect:
Steed • Dragon • Unique • +1 Hit Point
Characters of the opposing alignment within one rank have -3 ATK and -3 AC.
Order: Spend Soulwing: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Soulwing: Target character within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 23) or be stunned.

name: Ssithiss
effect:
Mercenary • Barbarian • Assassin • Monster • Unique • Sutkeh
Ssithiss is both a fighter and a rogue.
Ssithiss enters play as if he were level 5.
React: Once per turn, after Ssithiss is targeted by a melee strike or action: Perform a melee strike targeting the acting character. If his strike hits, cancel the strike or action.

name: Stolen Substance
effect: Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. If the strike hits, instead of wounding the target, until the end of the turn the target does not count for preventing illegal ranks.
"Thou shouldst thank me, given the dragons." - Lord Kestrel

name: Strategic Strike
effect: React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain +1 ATK for this strike for each non-fighter in your army. For every +5 ATK gained in this manner this fighter inflicts an additional wound if he hits with this melee strike.
"Fools. We slew thy forebear." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Syvonne Ashenstorm
effect:
NoThRoG Warlord • Powerattack +4 • Siegemaster • Fire Giant
Your Siege characters inflict an additional wound whenewer they hit with melee strikes. If any opposing Warlord is spent, ranged strikes performed by your Siege characters may target an additional rank away.

name: Syvonne's Secret
effect:
NoThRoG • Siege
May not maneuver or equip items.
Characters in the rank in front of Syvonne's Secret have the ability, "Spend Order: Move Syvonne's Secret forward one rank."
"Knock, knock, Kaballite cowards."

name: Tahmores Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
React: After Tahmores kills an opposing character: Permanently gain +5 ATK, an extra melee strike (base +0) or +1 Hit Point. Tahmores may only gain each bonus once per game.
"Bascaron rises, Valford, help me - I feel the madness."

name: Tempestroyal
effect:
Deverenian • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target up to 5 characters within one rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound and become spent.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Terlacha
effect:
Elf • Ranger
Spend Order: Preform a +5 ranged strike. If Terlacha is adjacent to a rogue he gains Marksmanship +5 for this action. If Terlacha is adajacent to a Wizard, this action can not be cancelled or redirected.

name: The First King's Crown
effect:
Helm
+1 Hit Point.
React: Before this fighter dies, spend a cleric in your army: Return the First King's Crown to your hand.
"Lost and found again, lost and found again. Do not simply exhume and restore history, improve upon it." - Jin Valford

name: The Hungry Dead
effect:
Elf • Assassin • Undead
React: After Hungry Dead wounds a target stunned character with a melee strike: Kill the target.
"Slay a dragon, but bring it home to our master." - Absinthe

name: The Storm's Truths
effect:
Stormwraith only. May be equipped to characters who may not equip items.
Magic Resistance +5
React: After this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), spend Storm's Truths: The acting character must succeed with a magic save (DC 14) or suffer a wound.

name: The True Word
effect: Order: Spend The True Word: If this cleric is cleric is adjacent to a fighter all of your characters gain +3 ATK. If this cleric is adjacent to a rogue all of your characters gain +3 AC. If this cleric is adjacent to a wizard all of your characters gain +5 Skill.
"Lost to an age of spite and avarice, Sir Rhawn, but not lost to me." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Twisting the Omens
effect: Spend Order: Spend a cleric within one rank: Perform a +4 ranged strike which inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If the strike kills the target, all characters in your first rank gain +4 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Tybast
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
While Tybast is in your discard pile, opposing characters have -2 Skill.
"The Free Kingdoms and dwarves lack the power, High Queen, and the nothrogs act blindly. Only the Kabal or the Deverenians could have stoked the dragons' ire."

name: Unfeeling Flesh
effect:
Undead only.
React: Before this character suffers wounds from an opposing character's action: The opposing character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or the wounds are reduced to zero. If he succeeds, return this card to your hand.

name: Valanthe's Web
effect:
Valanthe's Web may remain spent.
+2 Skill.
Order: Spend Valanthe's Web: Target another wizard in play, who has +4 Skill while Valanthe's Web is spent.
"Of course the High Queen suspects nothing, my parlor is a better place for such an exchange."

name: Vaxon
effect:
NoThRoG • Sav'rukk's Legion
Spend React: Before a NoThRoG in this rank dies: Spend a character within one rank.
"Hiding from Hate, hiding from Krun, hiding from dragons. S'all in a day's work.."

name: Vellum Press
effect:
Scribe +3.
Order: Discard Vellum Press: Attach a spell face-up from your hand to this wizard. The wizard may later discard the spell to cast it as if it were played from your hand.
"To my esteemed subjects: the Time of Naming is at hand..."

name: Venomhiss
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon
May not equip items. If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Venomhiss has +1 level for casting spells. Before rolling initiative, put a charge token on Venomhiss.
Order: Remove a charge token: Move forward or backward up to two ranks.

name: Wagon Team
effect:
Steed
Siege only. May be equipped to Siege characters who may not equip items.
Order: Spend Wagon Team: Move forward one rank.
Order: Spend Wagon Team: Equip Wagon Team to another Siege character.

name: Warren Brood
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Spend React: After an opposing character falls forward: Move a Lycanthrope forward one rank.
"Dragons, madness, and blood. We could do worse than listen to Valford."

name: Wheeled Pikes
effect:
NoThRoG • Siege
Spend React: After an opposing character moves within one rank: Perform a melee strike (base +5 ATK) targetting that character.
"Surround Baraxton with them. I'll be there shortly, and Ar'tek better explain." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Whetstone
effect:
Powerattack +3
React: Before making a melee strike roll, discard Whetstone: The melee strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"Keep your blades sharp, and your wits sharper." - Ahdi Akkhar

name: Withering Gaze
effect:
Spend Order: Target stunned character does not unstun during the next ready phase.
Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 9 + twice this cleric's HP or become stunned).

name: Wyvern's Claw
effect:
Weapon • Cursed
While this fighter has one or more wounds, he has an additional +2 ATK (+5 if he is a Barbarian).
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on this fighter: Perform a melee strike.
"Yes, flee, giant! Let Krun's champion face Hate's legacy!" - Padrig

name: Yscar's Rage
effect:
Unique • 1 Charge • Lycantrope only.
All Lycanthropes have +1 ATK and +1 AC for each charge token on Yscar's Rage. At the end of each turn put a charge token on Yscar's Rage. When Yscar's Rage has 5 or more tokens remove all tokens.
"Wait no longer. Come to Mourn." - Otho Yscar
